Epic.title: Epic Title Example
Epic.desc: A high-level overview or goal that encompasses multiple features or functionalities.

Feature.title: Feature Title Example
Feature.desc: A specific functionality or component that will be implemented to achieve part of the epic's goal.

Defect.title: Defect Title Example
Defect.desc: A report of an issue or bug found in the system.

Enhancement.title: Enhancement Title Example
Enhancement.desc: An improvement to an existing feature or functionality.

CPE Incident.title: CPE Incident Title Example
CPE Incident.desc: An incident related to customer or production environment issues.

UserStory.title: User Story Title Example
UserStory.desc: A description of a feature or functionality from the end-user perspective.

Spike.title: Spike Title Example
Spike.desc: A time-boxed research task to explore or investigate a problem.

Documentation.title: Documentation Title Example
Documentation.desc: A task to create or update project documentation.
